TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IcmpV6Statistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本機電腦之網際網路通訊協定第 6 版的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMPv6) 統計資料。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol for Internet Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) statistical data for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPV6 是一組的錯誤和參考用訊息，以便與網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6)。ICMPV6 is a set of error and informational messages for use with Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). 此類別由方法以傳回 ICMPV6 流量資訊。This class is used by the method to return ICMPV6 traffic information. 此類別中的屬性與相互關聯的管理資訊基礎物件定義於 IETF RFC 2466 ICMPv6。The properties in this class correlate to the Management Information Base objects for ICMPv6 defined in IETF RFC 2466. ICMPv6 被定義在 RFC 2463。ICMPv6 is defined in RFC 2463. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前的 ICMPv6 統計資料。The following example displays the current ICMPv6 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能由衍生自的類別可以呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得由於封包有無法到達的目的位址而收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6) 訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages received because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的「無法到達目的地」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法到達目的地 」 訊息可以傳送到任何下列其中一個原因是封包的來源電腦：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 在電腦中，找不到目的地位址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 系統管理禁止與目的地位址的通訊。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火牆會防止封包傳遞到目的地。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 無法連上目的地位址。The destination address is unreachable. - 無法連上目的地連接埠。The destination port is unreachable. 比方說，沒有任何接聽程式可用的封包的通訊協定。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#32)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得由於封包有無法到達的目的位址而傳送的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6) 訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages sent because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的「無法到達目的地」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法到達目的地 」 訊息可以傳送到任何下列其中一個原因是封包的來源電腦：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 在電腦中，找不到目的地位址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 系統管理禁止與目的地位址的通訊。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火牆會防止封包傳遞到目的地。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 無法連上目的地位址。The destination address is unreachable. - 無法連上目的地連接埠。The destination port is unreachable. 比方說，沒有任何接聽程式可用的封包的通訊協定。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#32)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EchoRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long EchoRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6)「回應回覆」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Echo Reply messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「回應回覆」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of number of ICMP Echo Reply messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回應要求和回應回覆訊息可讓要求從遠端電腦在網路上的 ICMP 回應的電腦。Echo Request and Echo Reply messages allow a computer to request an ICMP response from a remote computer on a network. 這項功能通常用來判斷遠端位址的有效性。This functionality is often used to determine the validity of remote addresses. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#30)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MembershipQueriesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long MembershipQueriesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路群組管理通訊協定 (Internet Group Management Protocol，IGMP)「群組成員資格查詢」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Group management Protocol (IGMP) Group Membership Query messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的「群組成員資格查詢」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Group Membership Query messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多點傳送的路由器傳送群組成員資格查詢 」 訊息以了解每個其附加的實體網路上具有成員的群組。Multicast routers send Group Membership Query messages to learn which groups have members on each of their attached physical networks. 藉由傳送為每個主機所加入的多點傳送群組的群組成員資格報告的群組成員資格查詢訊息回應主機電腦。Host computers respond to a Group Membership Query message by sending a Group Membership Report for each multicast group joined by the host. 主機電腦在加入新的多點傳送的群組時，也可以傳送群組成員資格報告。A host computer can also send a Group Membership Report when it joins a new multicast group. 當主機電腦離開多點傳送的群組時，會傳送群組成員資格簡化 」 訊息。Group Membership Reduction messages are sent when a host computer leaves a multicast group. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#34)]

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Group Membership Report messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多點傳送的路由器傳送群組成員資格查詢 」 訊息以了解每個其附加的實體網路上具有成員的群組。Multicast routers send Group Membership Query messages to learn which groups have members on each of their attached physical networks. 藉由傳送為每個主機所加入的多點傳送群組的群組成員資格報告的群組成員資格查詢訊息回應主機電腦。Host computers respond to a Group Membership Query message by sending a Group Membership Report for each multicast group joined by the host. 主機電腦在加入新的多點傳送的群組時，也可以傳送群組成員資格報告。A host computer can also send a Group Membership Report when it joins a new multicast group. 當主機電腦離開多點傳送的群組時，會傳送群組成員資格簡化 」 訊息。Group Membership Reduction messages are sent when a host computer leaves a multicast group. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#34)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MembershipReportsSent As Long
public: abstract property long MembershipReportsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已傳送的網際網路群組管理通訊協定 (IGMP)「群組成員資格報告」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) Group Membership Report messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的「群組成員資格報告」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Group Membership Report messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多點傳送的路由器傳送群組成員資格查詢 」 訊息以了解每個其附加的實體網路上具有成員的群組。Multicast routers send Group Membership Query messages to learn which groups have members on each of their attached physical networks. 藉由傳送為每個主機所加入的多點傳送群組的群組成員資格報告的群組成員資格查詢訊息回應主機電腦。Host computers respond to a Group Membership Query message by sending a Group Membership Report for each multicast group joined by the host. 主機電腦在加入新的多點傳送的群組時，也可以傳送群組成員資格報告。A host computer can also send a Group Membership Report when it joins a new multicast group. 當主機電腦離開多點傳送的群組時，會傳送群組成員資格簡化 」 訊息。Group Membership Reduction messages are sent when a host computer leaves a multicast group. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#34)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long MessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6) 訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMPv6 訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv6 messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv6 訊息會傳送至傳達錯誤，以及使用網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6) 傳送的封包的相關資訊。ICMPv6 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets sent using Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#33)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#33)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long MessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已傳送的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6) 訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的 ICMPv6 訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv6 messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv6 訊息會傳送至傳達錯誤，以及使用網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6) 傳送的封包的相關資訊。ICMPv6 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets sent using Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#33)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#33)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NeighborAdvertisementsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long NeighborAdvertisementsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6)「近鄰通告」(Neighbor Advertisement) 訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Neighbor Advertisement messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「近鄰通告」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Neighbor Advertisement messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鄰居探索是讓主機電腦和路由器可以決定位址的已知位於共用連結上鄰居的程序。Neighbor Discovery is a process whereby host computers and routers can determine the addresses for neighbors known to reside on shared links. 此探索程序會使用稱為 「 鄰居請求 」 和 「 近鄰通告 ICMP 訊息來完成。Part of this discovery process is accomplished using ICMP messages called Neighbor Solicitations and Neighbor Advertisements. 若要探索的芳鄰連結層位址，或確認鄰居仍然可以連線到透過快取的連結層位址，就會傳送近鄰請求 」 訊息。Neighbor Solicitation messages are sent to discover the link-layer address of a neighbor or to verify that a neighbor is still reachable via a cached link-layer address. 包含地址資訊的芳鄰通告是傳送以回應請求或宣布變更位址。A Neighbor Advertisement that contains address information is sent in response to a solicitation or to announce an address change. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NeighborAdvertisementsSent As Long
public: abstract property long NeighborAdvertisementsSent { long get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鄰居探索是讓主機電腦和路由器可以決定位址的已知位於共用連結上鄰居的程序。Neighbor Discovery is a process whereby host computers and routers can determine the addresses for neighbors known to reside on shared links. 此探索程序會使用稱為 「 鄰居請求 」 和 「 近鄰通告 ICMP 訊息來完成。Part of this discovery process is accomplished using ICMP messages called Neighbor Solicitations and Neighbor Advertisements. 若要探索的芳鄰連結層位址，或確認鄰居仍然可以連線到透過快取的連結層位址，就會傳送近鄰請求 」 訊息。Neighbor Solicitation messages are sent to discover the link-layer address of a neighbor or to verify that a neighbor is still reachable via a cached link-layer address. 包含地址資訊的芳鄰通告是傳送以回應請求或宣布變更位址。A Neighbor Advertisement that contains address information is sent in response to a solicitation or to announce an address change. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketTooBigMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long PacketTooBigMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6)「封包太大」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Packet Too Big messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「封包太大」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Packet Too Big messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法轉送封包，因為它已超過最大傳輸單位 (MTU) 的連出連結時，路由器就會傳送封包太大的訊息。A router sends a Packet Too Big message when a packet cannot be forwarded because it is larger than the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the outgoing link. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#36)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#36)]

public: abstract property long PacketTooBigMessagesSent { long get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6)「參數問題」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Parameter Problem messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「參數問題」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數問題 」 訊息傳送時的主機電腦或路由器處理封包標頭，例如遇到無效的 IPv6 選項或無效的下一個標頭類型的內容時遇到問題。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering a invalid IPv6 option or a invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#39)]

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的 ICMP「參數問題」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數問題 」 訊息傳送時的主機電腦或路由器處理封包標頭，例如遇到無效的 IPv6 選項或下一個標頭類型無效的內容時遇到問題。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv6 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. public: abstract property long RedirectsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6)「重新導向」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Redirect messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「重新導向」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新導向 」 訊息會由路由器傳送，以通知主機電腦的目的地位址的較佳路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#37)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#37)]

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Router Advertisement messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的「路由器通告」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Advertisement messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機電腦可以傳送 IP 資料包中超過其直接附加的子網路之前，它必須探索該子網路上的至少一個路由器的位址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 此探索，可以使用稱為 「 路由器通告 」 和 「 路由器請求 」 ICMP 訊息來完成。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 通告 」 訊息會傳送路由器會定期地宣布其目前狀態和其介面的位址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 當電腦連線到網路，而不是等候接收路由器通告時，它可以傳送路由器請求 」 要求的路由器立即傳送其公告。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

public: abstract property long RouterAdvertisementsSent { long get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機電腦可以傳送 IP 資料包中超過其直接附加的子網路之前，它必須探索該子網路上的至少一個路由器的位址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 此探索，可以使用稱為 「 路由器通告 」 和 「 路由器請求 」 ICMP 訊息來完成。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 通告 」 訊息會傳送路由器會定期地宣布其目前狀態和其介面的位址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 當電腦連線到網路，而不是等候接收路由器通告時，它可以傳送路由器請求 」 要求的路由器立即傳送其公告。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 6 版 (ICMPv6)「超過時間」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Time Exceeded messages received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「超過時間」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封包的躍點限制會決定可以轉送會被捨棄之前的次數。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 將封包時，每次它躍點限制的值會減一。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 「 躍點限制達到零時或路由器收到使用其設定為零的躍點限制的封包時，會捨棄封包和封包的來源接收時間已超過的訊息，指出初始的躍點限制的太小或封包已攔截到的路由ting 迴圈。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesSent { long get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封包的躍點限制會決定可以轉送會被捨棄之前的次數。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 將封包時，每次它躍點限制的值會減一。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 「 躍點限制達到零時或路由器收到使用其設定為零的躍點限制的封包時，會捨棄封包和封包的來源接收時間已超過的訊息，指出初始的躍點限制的太小或封包已攔截到的路由ting 迴圈。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#38)]
